Wellington nightlife killing: Siale Siale admits the manslaughter of Luke Smith https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/wellington-nightlife-killing-siale-siale-admits-the-manslaughter-of-luke-smith/BR222XCGMRH6JGQEWOQ7DLP5WQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/wellington-nightlife-killing-siale-siale-admits-the-manslaughter-of-luke-smith/BR222XCGMRH6JGQEWOQ7DLP5WQ/ Catherine HuttonSiale taunted and kicked his unconscious victim, who later died.
